newFeatures.title: Added Support for the OPTIONS Verb on Endpoints' Routes
description: You can now add a new route using the OPTIONS verb directly from your Endpoint's detail page.

improvements.title: More insights on production environments from the Projects table
description: We resolved an issue that occurred in a specific scenario: when a ConfigMap was deleted and immediately recreated with the same name, the Console could fail to save the change correctly, causing configuration corruption. This configuration can then only be restored using a previous snapshot, which is possible within the [dedicated Revision History modal](/docs/products/console/set-up-infrastructure/revisions-and-versions#revision-history). This fix has been implemented also on _Console Helm Chart_ `v14.2.2-0`.

bugFixes: We resolved an issue that occurred in a specific scenario: when a ConfigMap was deleted and immediately recreated with the same name, the Console could fail to save the change correctly, causing configuration corruption. This configuration can then only be restored using a previous snapshot, which is possible within the [dedicated Revision History modal](/docs/products/console/set-up-infrastructure/revisions-and-versions#revision-history). This fix has been implemented also on _Console Helm Chart_ `v15.0.3-beta.2`.
